Welcome to KPS Connect! Over time you\u0027ll see this intro become more functional, stay tuned!

Version 4.5.0
- Split up permissions slides
- Log user\'s email IDs for personalised notifications
- Fix a couple of major bugs
- Cleanup code
Version 4.3.0
- Show loading dialog on start
- Add animations to feed and feedback activities
- Make registration ID info more clear
Version 4.2.0
- Make Used Libraries section more useful
Version 4.1.0
- Initial public release
Version 4.0.0
- Massive improvements to feed
Version 3.0.0-beta
- Last beta version
Tap on a card to read the post, long press to share
To send you notifications, we need to store a small ID token on your device and that needs storage permissions. Grant them here!
We use your email ID to send personalised notifications whenever needed, that needs contact permissions. We do NOT read your contacts EVER.
You need to grant the permission first!
No Email app was found on your device. Would you like to install Gmail?
These are the libraries used to make the app. Each guy did a fab job!
